item.title: 网络安全服务需求强劲，黑莓第一季度收入超出预期
item.description: 加拿大黑莓公司（BlackBerry）周三公布的第一季度营收超过预期，主要原因是网络安全服务的需求在网络威胁不断增加的情况下有所回升。【原文：Canada's BlackBerry , beat first-quarter revenue estimates on Wednesday, driven by a resilient demand for cybersecurity services in the wake of growing online threats.】

item.title: 早间竞价通胀恐慌与日元熊市
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，凯雷和 KKR 赢得了 Discover Financial 100 亿美元学生贷款账簿的拍卖
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，凯雷和 KKR & Co 赢得了 Discover Financial 100 亿美元学生贷款的拍卖。【原文：Carlyle and KKR & Co won an auction for a $10 billion student loan book from Discover Financial , the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国银行损失更严重，但在美联储年度健康检查中保留了大量缓冲区
item.description: 美联储周三进行的年度 "压力测试 "显示，美国最大的银行将有足够的资本抵御严重的经济和市场动荡，但由于投资组合风险较高，这些银行今年将面临更大的假设损失。【原文：The biggest U.S. banks would have enough capital to withstand severe economic and market turmoil, the Federal Reserve's annual "stress test" exercise showed on Wednesday, but firms faced steeper hypothetical losses this year due to riskier portfolios.】

item.title: 消息人士称波音恢复向中国交付宽体飞机
item.description: 据一家航班跟踪网站和熟悉内情的消息人士称，波音公司正在恢复最近几周因中国监管审查而停止的对华宽体飞机交付。【原文：Boeing is resuming widebody jet deliveries to China which were halted in recent weeks due to a Chinese regulatory review, according to a flight tracking site and source familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 杰富瑞第二季度利润因交易反弹而大增
item.description: 杰富瑞金融公司（Jefferies Financial）周三表示，该公司第二季度的利润增长了近 12 倍，因为它从交易咨询以及股票和债券销售承销中赚取了更高的费用。【原文：Jefferies Financial's second-quarter profit jumped nearly twelve-fold as it earned higher fees from advising on deals as well as underwriting stock and bond sales, the bank said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Levi Strauss 公布季度收入不及预期，但维持年度预期
item.description: 李维-斯特劳斯公司（Levi Strauss）周三公布的第二季度收入低于市场预期，但维持了对利润和收入的年度预测，原因是美国市场对其牛仔服装的需求不稳定。【原文：Levi Strauss fell short of market expectations for second-quarter revenue on Wednesday and maintained its annual forecast for profit and revenue, on choppy demand for its denim clothing in the United States.】

item.title: 美光第三季度营收超出预期
item.description: 芯片制造商美光科技（Micron Technology）周三公布的第三季度营收超出预期，主要原因是人工智能产业的蓬勃发展对其内存芯片的需求激增，以及其他市场定价的提高。【原文：Chipmaker Micron Technology beat estimates for third-quarter revenue on Wednesday, driven by a surge in demand for its memory chips from the booming AI industry and improved pricing in other markets.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国监管机构可能会批准现货以太坊 ETF 在 7 月 4 日前推出
item.description: 业内高管和其他参与者告诉路透社，随着资产管理公司与监管机构之间的谈判进入最后阶段，美国证券交易委员会最快将于7月4日批准与以太坊现货价格挂钩的交易所交易基金（ETF）。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission could approve exchange traded funds (ETFs) tied to the spot price of ether as soon as July 4, as talks between asset managers and regulators enter the final stages, industry executives and other participants told Reuters.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，由于中国进口产品关税提高，沃尔沃将推迟 EX30 在美国的发货时间
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三报道，沃尔沃（Volvo）将推迟在美国交付其EX30电动汽车，因为在关税上调后，该公司将紧凑型SUV的生产转移到了中国以外的地区。【原文：Volvo will postpone the U.S. deliveries of its EX30 electric car as it shifts production of the compact SUV out of China in the wake of tariff hikes, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 共和党州检察长质疑美国燃油经济性新规
item.description: 以西弗吉尼亚州和肯塔基州为首的 26 个州的总检察长周三对拜登政府的新燃油经济性规定提出质疑，称这些要求不可行，并迫使汽车制造商生产更多的电动汽车。【原文：A group of 26 state attorneys general led by West Virginia and Kentucky on Wednesday challenged the Biden administration's new fuel economy rules, calling the requirements unworkable and forcing automakers to build more electric vehicles.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，Codelco 公司 5 月份铜产量低于目标
item.description: 路透社获得的一份内部文件显示，全球最大的铜生产商之一、智利国有矿业巨头 Codelco 公司 5 月份的产量进一步落后于其生产目标，这凸显了在 25 年低点恢复产量所面临的挑战。【原文：Chile's state mining giant Codelco, one of the world's largest copper producers, fell further behind its production target in May, an internal document obtained by Reuters showed, underscoring the challenge to revive output at a 25-year low.】

item.title: 加密货币公司 Abra 因无证经营与美国各州达成和解
item.description: 美国 25 个州的金融监管机构周三宣布，与加密货币投资平台 Abra 及其首席执行官达成和解，原因是他们在没有获得州政府许可的情况下开展业务。【原文：Financial regulators in 25 U.S. states announced on Wednesday a settlement with cryptocurrency investment platform Abra and its CEO for operating without required state licensing.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，亚马逊将推出折扣专区，直接从中国发货
item.description: 据《信息时报》周三援引向中国卖家展示的幻灯片报道，亚马逊公司计划在其购物网站上推出一个专栏，介绍从中国仓库直接向海外消费者发货的廉价商品。【原文：Amazon.com plans to launch a section on its shopping site featuring cheap items that ship directly to overseas consumers from warehouses in China, the Information reported on Wednesday, citing slides shown to Chinese sellers.】

item.title: 美国银行的 Subramanian 称，美国价值型股票为低价股猎手提供了机会
item.description: 美国银行全球研究公司（Bank of America Global Research）股票与量化策略师萨维塔-苏布拉马尼安（Savita Subramanian）周三表示，价值型股票在今年严重落后于成长型股票之后，在美国股市中提供了一些最有吸引力的估值。【原文：Value stocks offer some of the most compelling valuations in the U.S. equity market after badly lagging their growth-focused counterparts this year, Bank of America Global Research equity and quant strategist Savita Subramanian said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，复杂出价可能延长 Citgo 拍卖评估时间
item.description: 三位与此事关系密切的人士称，美国联邦法院可能会延长委内瑞拉炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 母公司股份拍卖投标的审查期限，这将推迟这一长达七年之久的案件的解决时间。【原文：A U.S. federal court will likely extend a period for reviewing bids submitted in an auction of shares in the parent of Venezuela-owned refiner Citgo Petroleum, three people close to the matter said, which would delay a resolution to the seven-year-long case.】

item.title: 秘鲁试图通过工业园区激励措施吸引比亚迪汽车厂入驻
item.description: 秘鲁总统周三会见了中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪公司，邀请该公司高管到安第斯国家的太平洋沿岸开店，另一家中国公司正在那里建设一个大型港口，以促进两国之间的贸易。【原文：Peru's president met with Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD on Wednesday, inviting executives to set up shop on the Andean nation's Pacific coast where another Chinese firm is building a massive port to facilitate trade between the two countries.】

item.title: 亚马逊因人工智能热潮和降息押注估值达 2 万亿美元
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc）市值周三首次突破 2 万亿美元，成为第五家市值突破这一水平的美国公司，原因是对人工智能和今年可能降息的乐观情绪推动了对科技相关股票的需求。【原文：Amazon.com Inc hit $2 trillion in market value for the first time on Wednesday, becoming the fifth U.S. company to surpass that level as optimism around artificial intelligence and potential interest rate cuts this year drove demand for technology-related stocks.】

item.title: 肯尼迪机场新一号航站楼发行 25.5 亿美元债券，为大修贷款再融资
item.description: 两位熟悉该交易的消息人士称，由纽约约翰-肯尼迪国际机场的劳工、运营和金融合作伙伴组成的财团--新一号航站楼（NTO）正准备在 6 月份发行 25.5 亿美元的债券，以继续为 2022 年筹集的银行贷款进行再融资。【原文：The New Terminal One (NTO), a consortium of labor, operating and financial partners at New York's John F. Kennedy International Airport, is preparing to issue $2.55 billion in bonds in June to continue refinancing bank loans raised in 2022, two sources familiar with the deal said.】

item.title: 降雨过后，巴拿马运河提升了船舶水深和新巴拿马型船闸的通过能力
item.description: 巴拿马运河管理局周三表示，最近的降雨提高了水位，使得载货量更大的重型船舶可以通过运河的新巴拿马型船闸。【原文：The Panama Canal authority said on Wednesday that recent rains boosted water levels, allowing heavier ships with larger cargo loads to transit the canal's Neopanamax locks.】

item.title: 花旗集团确认风险数据、分析、报告和技术主管离职
item.description: 花旗集团风险数据、分析、报告和技术主管彼得-蔡（Peter Cai）已从该行离职，发言人证实了这一消息。【原文：Citigroup's head of risk data, analytics, reporting and tech Peter Cai has left the bank, a spokesman confirmed.】

item.title: 拜登将高达 7500 万美元的《CHIPS 法案》赠款授予 Entegris 公司
item.description: 美国芯片制造供应商Entegris公司周三表示，该公司已与拜登政府达成初步协议，将出资7500万美元帮助在科罗拉多州科罗拉多斯普林斯市建立新工厂。【原文：American Chip manufacturing supplier Entegris said on Wednesday that it has inked a preliminary deal with the Biden administration for funding of up to $75 million to aid the development of a new facility in Colorado Springs, Colorado.】

item.title: 诺和诺德终止肾病试验，第二季度减值 8.16 亿美元
item.description: 诺和诺德公司周三表示，由于CLARION-CKD三期试验未能达到主要终点，该公司将在2024年第二季度确认约57亿丹麦克朗（约合8.1672亿美元）的减值损失。【原文：Novo Nordisk said on Wednesday it would recognise an impairment loss of about 5.7 billion Danish crowns ($816.72 million) in the second quarter of 2024, after its CLARION-CKD phase 3 trial failed to meet its primary endpoint.】

item.title: 美国 5 月新屋销售下滑至六个月低点
item.description: 由于抵押贷款利率飙升拖累了需求，5月份美国新建独栋住宅的销量降至六个月来的最低点，这进一步证明了房地产市场的复苏步履蹒跚。【原文：Sales of new U.S. single-family homes dropped to a six-month low in May as a jump in mortgage rates weighed on demand, offering more evidence that the housing market recovery was faltering.】

item.title: 日本最高货币外交官对日元快速下跌的警告升级
item.description: 日本最高货币外交官神田正人（Masato Kanda）表示，当局对日元的快速下跌 "严重关切并保持高度警惕"。【原文：Japan's top currency diplomat Masato Kanda said that authorities are "seriously concerned and on high alert" about the yen's rapid decline, escalating warnings as the Japanese currency languished at its weakest level in almost forty years.】

item.title: 克罗地亚初创公司准备在萨格勒布推出自动驾驶出租车 Verne
item.description: 自动驾驶汽车初创公司 Project 3 Mobility（P3）由克罗地亚电动汽车制造商 Rimac 集团的创始人创立，该公司周三展示了以法国作家儒勒-凡尔纳命名的自动驾驶机器人出租车，计划于 2026 年推出。【原文：Autonomous vehicle startup Project 3 Mobility (P3), set up by the founder of Croatian electric vehicle maker Rimac Group, presented on Wednesday its self-driving robotaxi named after French writer Jules Verne ahead of a planned launch in 2026.】

item.title: 解说员：大众 50 亿美元押注 Rivian 电动汽车软件背后的原因是什么？
item.description: 欧洲最大的汽车制造商大众汽车公司计划斥资 50 亿美元与美国 Rivian 公司合作开发电动汽车 (EV) 软件。【原文：Volkswagen , Europe's biggest carmaker, plans to spend as much as $5 billion on an electric vehicle (EV) software partnership with U.S.-based Rivian .】

item.title: 美敦力称首席财务官卡伦-帕克希尔将离职加盟惠普
item.description: 美敦力公司周三表示，其首席财务官卡伦-帕克希尔（Karen Parkhill）将从公司辞职，到惠普公司担任类似职务。【原文：Medtronic said on Wednesday its Chief Financial Officer Karen Parkhill will resign from the company to accept a similar role at HP Inc .】

item.title: 报告显示，受 CDK 网络故障影响，美国 6 月汽车销量预计下滑
item.description: 据行业咨询公司J.D. Power和GlobalData周三联合发布的一份报告称，受CDK网络攻击导致的故障影响，美国6月份的新车销量预计将同比下降。【原文：New vehicle sales in the United States are projected to fall in June from a year ago, hurt by the CDK cyber attack-led outage that has impacted dealers across the country, according to a joint report by industry consultants J.D. Power and GlobalData on Wednesday.】

item.title: Interactive Brokers 称因纽约证券交易所故障损失 480 万美元
item.description: 经纪公司 Interactive Brokers 周三表示，由于本月早些时候纽约证券交易所出现故障，导致伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）股票价格大幅波动，该公司损失了 4800 万美元。【原文：Brokerage firm Interactive Brokers said on Wednesday it had lost $48 million due to a glitch at the New York Stock Exchange earlier this month that triggered massive swings in the price of Berkshire Hathaway's stock.】
